name: Ships of Madness
description: Welcome all ye Space Fools to Ships of Madness. You play a rogue space pirate as you plunder ships belonging to the three biggest factions in the known universe. There is the cult-like Order of the Monolith; the cybernetically enhanced Hive Mind; and the genetically augmented Corpus Factum. Fight your way through their crews in 3 distinct levels as you fight, plan, and experiment your way through their crews.
